Common.effect: You can now process Elemental Flesh. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 7 per piece.

Recipes.effect: You can now process Mythical Metal. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 2 per piece.
This item can be used on a weapon that is at least 45 cm long, allowing the weapon to make one BLAST attack today. Only one whetstone can affect a weapon at a time.
Recipes.components: 2 inspiration or 1 Mythical Metal and 5 copper coins.

Recipes.effect: You can now process Mythical Steel. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by: 7 per piece.
This item can be used on a weapon of at least 45 cm, the weapon can CRUSH once today. A weapon can be influenced by 1 whetstone at a time.
Recipes.components: 3 inspiration for 1 Level 2 Whetstone or 1 Mythical Steel plus 10 copper coins for 2 Level 2 Whetstones

Recipes.effect: You can now process Mythical Mithril. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by: 27 per piece.
This item can be used on a weapon of at least 45 cm, the weapon can DESTROY once today. A weapon can be influenced by 1 whetstone at a time.
Recipes.components: 4 inspiration for 1 Level 3 Whetstone or 1 Mythical Mithril for 5 Level 3 Whetstones

Recipes.effect: You can now process Mythical Wood. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by: 2 per piece.
This item can be used to make a person immune to fear for 1 hour or can be used during a Woad-of-Blood ritual to extend the Woad-of-Blood duration on 1 person to 2 hours instead of 1 hour.
Recipes.components: 1 inspiration for 1 Totem of the Wolf or 1 Mythical Wood and 5 copper coins for 2 Totems of the Wolf

Recipes.effect: You can now process Mythical Ebony. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by: 7 per piece.

This item can be used to make a person immune to the next mindaffecting effect within the next hour, or can be used in combination with a Totem of the Wolf during a Woad-of-Blood ritual to extend the Woad-of-Blood duration on 1 person to 4 hours instead of 1 hour.
Recipes.components: 1 inspiration for 1 Totem of the Owl or 1 Mythical Ebony for 5 Totems of the Owl

Recipes.effect: You can now process Mythical Worldtree Sapling. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by: 27 per piece.

This item can be used to give a person 2 extra HP for 1 hour, or can be used in combination with a Totem of the Wolf and a Totem of the Owl during a Woad-of-Blood ritual to extend the Woad-of-Blood duration on 1 person for the entire day instead of 1 hour.
Recipes.components: 4 inspiration for 1 Totem of the Bull or 1 Mythical Worldtree Sapling for 5 Totems of the Bull

Recipes.effect: You can now process Mythical Cloth. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 2 per piece.
This item can be used with the Healing skill instead of requiring Willpower.
Recipes.components: 1 inspiration for 1 High Quality Bandage or 1 Mythical Cloth and 5 copper coins for 2 High Quality Bandages

Recipes.effect: You can now process Mythical Velvet. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 7 per piece.

This item can be used once to connect 10 members of a group or guild to it. These 10 members can choose to recover x energy of their choice within the tent where this flag hangs today by resting for a few minutes with at least 1 other member of the group.
You can now process Mythical Spidersilk. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 27 per piece.

This item can be used once to connect 12 members of a group or guild to it. These 12 members can choose to recover x energy of their choice after a battle today that they spent during that battle when the banner was raised.
Recipes.components: 8*x inspiration or 1 Mythical Spidersilk and 40 copper coins for an x of 3

Recipes.effect: You can now process Mythical Paper. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 2 per piece.
Scroll paper that can be used for the 'Rune Scroll Crafting' or 'Glyph Scroll Crafting' skill. Scroll paper does not expire unlike other mundane items.
You can now process Mythical Vellum. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 7 per piece.
If a person takes notes for 3 events about their research into an additional skill, they can then learn this additional skill without a teacher.
You can now process Mythical Griffinskin Vellum. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 27 per piece.
If a person makes personal notes about their life and experiences around this event, the person gets an additional 0.25 XP after this event. You can only use one such book per event.
You can now process Mythical Leather. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 2 per piece.
This item can be used on armor to achieve the same effect as a Mend spell.
Recipes.components: 1 inspiration for 1 Armor Repair Kit or 1 Mythical leather and 5 copper coins for 2 Armor Repair Kits.

Recipes.effect: You can now process Mythical Scale. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 7 per piece.
This item can be used on armor to add 1 extra armor point for a day.
Recipes.components: 2 inspiration for 1 Armor Reinforcement or 1 Mythical scale for 2 Armor Reinforcements

Recipes.effect: You can now process Mythical Dragonscale. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 27 per piece.
This item can be used on armor to add 2 extra armor points for a day.
Recipes.components: 3 inspiration for 1 Heavy Armor Reinforcement or 1 Mythical dragonscale for 7 Heavy Armor Reinforcements

Recipes.effect: You can now process Copper Ingots. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 2 per piece.

You can give this item to someone and declare your friendship. This person then gains 2 energy of their choice. If this person dies during this event or the friendship ends, you lose 4 energy of your choice the next game day.
You can now process Silver Ingots. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 7 per piece.

With this item, two willing individuals can declare an alliance to each other. If either person lies to the other during this event or breaks a promise to the other, this item immediately breaks when the persons (re)unite, and both persons receive an incite aggression effect.
You can now process Golden Ingots. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 27 per piece.

With this item, someone can enter into a marriage with another person. From that moment until the end of the marriage, you can give 10 of your energy of your choice per day to the other person when you are together. If the other person ever dies or the marriage ends, you lose 10 energy of your choice the next game day. (With 2 items, you can make the connection work both ways.)
You can now process Quartz. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 2 per piece.
You create a piece of jewelry using 5 of the same type of quartz and sell it for 3 gold (at the information desk). Every 2 inspiration you invest here reduces the required quartz by 1.
Recipes.components: 0 to 10 inspiration (depending on the amount of the same type of Quartz)

Recipes.effect: You can now process Gems. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 5 per piece.
You create a piece of jewelry using 5 of the same type of gems and sell it for 7 gold (at the information desk). Every 4 inspiration you invest here reduces the required gems by 1.
Recipes.components: 0 to 20 inspiration (depending on the amount of the same type of Gems)

Recipes.effect: You can now process Flawless Gems. \nThis increases the Imbue cap of the item by 10 per piece.
You create a piece of jewelry using 5 of the same type of flawless gems and sell it for 15 gold (at the information desk). Every 8 inspiration you invest here reduces the required flawless gems by 1.
Recipes.components: 0 to 40 inspiration (depending on the amount of the same type of Flawless Gems)

Recipes.effect: Heals 1 HP. Does not work if the drinker is incapacitated or has a FATAL.
Heals 3 HP. Does not work if the drinker is incapacitated or has a FATAL.
Heals 1 HP if you do not have a FATAL.
Heals 3 HP if you do not have a FATAL.
Extends grace period by 10 minutes. Only works on individuals with a FATAL.
Heals effects of a hangover.
Heals FATAL and 1 HP.
Heals a HIT DISEASE (including damage).
Heals a disease of choice (including effect or damage).
Heals or prevents the next 2 FEAR or FEAR POISON today.
Heals or prevents the next SLEEP or SLEEP POISON today.
Strengthens for an hour but then removes unrequited love feelings.
Heals FATAL and restores all HP. Also regrows ritual removed limbs.
Recipes.components: 2 Catnip, 1 Fool’s stem, 1 Ivan’s hood, 1 Nimpf’s blossom

Recipes.effect: Heals all diseases and the effects and damage caused.
Heals or prevents the next PARALYZE, PARALYZE POISON, TORTURE or TORTURE POISON today.
Heals or prevents the next CONFUSE or CONFUSE POISON today.
Heals or prevents the next FATAL POISON today.
Removes mental blocks that make you forget things (such as hypnosis).
Your next strike with a weapon of at least 45cm hits STRIKE.
Your next strike hits HIT POISON.
Your next strike hits FEAR POISON.
Poisons food or drink with SLEEP POISON.
Poisons food or drink with PARALYZE POISON.
If the willing pregnant person agrees, the fetus dies.
Your next strike hits BLAST POISON.
Your next strike with a weapon of at least 45cm hits BLAST.
Your next strike hits MUTE POISON.
Your next strike hits PARALYZE POISON.
Poisons food or drink with TORTURE POISON.
Poisons food or drink, making a person depressed for an hour.
Your next 2 strikes hit BLAST POISON.
Your next strike with a weapon of at least 45cm hits CRUSH.
Your next 3 strikes hit CONFUSE POISON.
Your next strike hits FATAL POISON.
Poisons food or drink with FATAL POISON.
If the willing drinker wishes, they can decide to spontaneously die at some point today.
When this potion is opened, the opener and a person of choice within 5 meters receive a CONFUSE effect.
You receive 1 ritual mana of choice back. \nThis potion cannot be made durable.
You can cast a DISCERN SOUL spell once within 5 minutes. \nNo mana is required to cast this spell.
Today you can use a scroll once without needing the RUNE USE or GLYPH USE skill.

When this potion is used at a ritual site with a connection to the spirit world (e.g., a grove), you may experience visions of spirits to gain insight into current affairs. Requires a game master when used.
You vividly relive a personal memory of your choice. (As long as you or another player remembers this OC. This potion cannot be used to inquire information from the game master).
You receive 2 ritual mana of choice back. \nThis potion cannot be made durable.
You gain access to the RUNE USE and GLYPH USE skills until sunrise.
You can cast a DETECT MAGIC spell once within 5 minutes. \nNo mana is required to cast this spell.
You can cast a DETECT SPIRITUAL INFLUENCE spell once within 5 minutes. \nNo mana is required to cast this spell.

When this potion is used at a ritual site with a connection to the spirit world (e.g., a grove), up to 10 people may experience visions of spirits to gain insight into the history of a touched person or object. Requires a game master.
Recipes.components: 2 Nodens Veil, 1 Raven’s eye, 1 Nimpf’s blossom

Recipes.effect: You vividly relive a memory of a touched person who willingly cooperates. (As long as the player remembers this OC. This potion cannot be used to inquire information from the game master).
You receive 3 ritual mana of choice back. \nThis potion cannot be made durable.
Within 15 minutes, you can freely speak with the bodies of willing dead around you. You also pour a portion of the potion into their mouths (up to 10 bodies).
Recipes.components: 2 Nodens Veil, 1 Fool’s stem, 1 Raven’s eye, 1 Nimpf’s blossom

Recipes.effect: Within 15 minutes, you can cast DISCERN SOUL spells up to 10 times. No mana is required to cast these spells.
Recipes.components: 2 Nodens Veil, 1 Ivan’s hood, 1 Raven’s eye, 1 Oracle’s tung

Recipes.effect: When this potion is shared at a ritual site with a connection to the spirit world (e.g., a grove), up to 10 people may experience visions of spirits to gain insight into current affairs. Requires a game master.
Recipes.components: 2 Nodens Veil, 2 Ivan’s hood, 1 Oracle’s tung

Recipes.effect: When this potion is used at a ritual site with a connection to the spirit world (e.g., a grove), you may experience visions of spirits to gain insight into future events. Requires a game master.
Recipes.components: 3 Nodens Veil, 1 Ivan’s hood, 1 Fool’s stem, 1 Oracle’s tung

Recipes.effect: Your mind melds with a touched person who willingly cooperates for 5 minutes. Both persons experience each other’s thoughts, emotions, and viewpoints. This may lead to minor personality changes afterwards.
Grants you the ability to use 1 weapon or shield for 5 minutes without the correct skill.
You regain 1 willpower. \nThis potion cannot be made long-lasting.
You regain 1 inspiration. \nThis potion cannot be made long-lasting.
For 10 minutes, you can defend and retreat while disabled. You cannot attack or cast spells. This effect ends if you suffer 1 damage.
Grants 1 extra HP for 5 minutes (healable).
Makes you confident (but does not protect against fear effects).
Allows you to apply battlefield first aid (as the skill) today, using healing saliva.
Grants 2 extra HP for 5 minutes (healable).
Grants 1 extra HP for the day (healable).
You regain 2 willpower. \nThis potion cannot be made long-lasting.
You regain 2 inspiration. \nThis potion cannot be made long-lasting.
Increases your feelings of empathy and charity.
Allows you to apply battlefield surgery (as the skill) today, using healing blood.
Grants 3 extra HP for 5 minutes (healable).
Immune to the next spell cast on you within an hour.
You regain 3 willpower. \nThis potion cannot be made long-lasting.
You regain 3 inspiration. \nThis potion cannot be made long-lasting.
Makes you happy for an hour. Addictive to some individuals (you may decide).
Allows you to cast a Fireblast spell once today without expending energy, but you receive a BLAST effect afterward.
You regain 1 spiritual mana. \nThis potion cannot be made long-lasting.
You regain 1 elemental mana. \nThis potion cannot be made long-lasting.
Upon drinking, choose a level 1 cleric spell (which you do not necessarily know). You can cast this spell once today without needing mana.

Recipes.recipe: Minor potion of inspiration of the magi
Recipes.effect: Upon drinking, choose a level 1 wizard spell (which you do not necessarily know). You can cast this spell once today without needing mana.
Allows you, if desired, to permanently change your hair color once.
Allows you to cast an unlimited number of level 1 spells of your choice today. You still need the correct mana.
Recipes.components: 1 Allysa’s bane, 1 Raven’s eye, 1 Fools stem

Recipes.effect: You regain 2 spiritual mana. \nThis potion cannot be made long-lasting.
You regain 2 elemental mana. \nThis potion cannot be made long-lasting.
Upon drinking, choose a level 2 cleric spell (which you do not necessarily know). You can cast this spell once today without needing mana.
Upon drinking, choose a level 2 wizard spell (which you do not necessarily know). You can cast this spell once today without needing mana.
Allows you, if desired, to permanently change your skin color once.
Allows you to cast an unlimited number of level 2 spells of your choice today. You still need the correct mana.
Recipes.components: 1 Allysa’s bane, 1 Raven’s eye, 1 Fools stem, 1 Oracle’s tung

Recipes.effect: You regain 3 spiritual mana. \nThis potion cannot be made long-lasting.
You regain 3 elemental mana. \nThis potion cannot be made long-lasting.
Upon drinking, choose a level 3 cleric spell (which you do not necessarily know). You can cast this spell once today without needing mana.
Recipes.components: 1 Allysa’s bane, 2 Raven’s eye, 1 Oracle’s tung

Recipes.effect: Upon drinking, choose a level 3 wizard spell (which you do not necessarily know). You can cast this spell once today without needing mana.
Recipes.components: 1 Allysa’s bane, 2 Fools stem, 1 Oracle’s tung

Recipes.effect: For one hour, your character traits and behavior will temporarily mimic those of a person standing before you.
